review: H1Z1 is an amazing game, it's very realistic (besides the zombies obviously) you have to look after your character to stay alive for example eat food, stay hydrated and sleep. Battle Royale is the biggest attraction of H1Z1 as it's competitors don't have it.I r8 8/8 m8 while I finger my prost8.:]
